Reviews

review by - Yelp

Asheton Q.:

This is the BEST pizza place ever !! Craig has the best customer service ever, if in need of a good time and good food come here

review by - Yelp

Neil J.:

Getting a couple of pizzas on IOP can be challenging. LnO was slammed on a Saturday night, but still produced a really good white pizza and a pepperoni

review by - Yelp

Lynda H.:

Loved this pizza! The crust is so yummy and love the red sauce on the pizza. Friendly staff too! Will definitely be back!

review by - Yelp

Jonathan S.:

Some of the best pizza ive ever had. Great location in Isle of Palms, if I am ever down at the beach this is my first choice when I am hungry. Great service too!
